abstract: Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation closes Community Banks of Colorado, Community Capital Bank, Decatur First Bank and Old Harbor Bank.
snippet: Regulators on Friday closed two banks in Georgia and one each in Florida and Colorado, raising to 84 the number of American banks that have failed this year.
lead_paragraph: Regulators on Friday closed two banks in Georgia and one each in Florida and Colorado, raising to 84 the number of American banks that have failed this year.

headline.main: F.D.I.C. Closes Four Banks Burdened by Home Loans
headline.print_headline: F.D.I.C. Closes Four Banks Burdened by Home Loans
